headline.main: Germans in Rostov Region Offer Menace to British and Red Positions

lead_paragraph: As the Germans pushed deeper into the Donets Basin yesterday and Axis supply ships -- despite heavy losses -- continued to ferry troops and supplies from Italy to North Africa, the Middle Bast, cornerstone of the British Empire, assumed a growing importance in the strategy of world struggle.
abstract: H W Baldwin on German Rostov drive

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
